Welcome to the Bamdocar's system, rookie.

 The war between the planets is pressing and, the governments have decided to recruit us.

 Us! The Scorpion are ready to fight, even against our brothers, with enough money obviously.

 Now I will teach you how to command your troops.
Discipline over all, this is how she train the best Guldrum space force

Objective:
 The player's goal is to be able to place one of his cards in the main planet of the enemy

 How to play:
 Each player will be assigned a randomly generated deck.

At each turn the player can choose if place a card while spending resources, move one of the cards played, attack an enemy card if this is near or sacrifice 1 life point of a card to get resources on the planet in which it is located.
Commands\n Pressing on a card located in our hand will focus(elarge) it to see more details.\n Holding down on a card located in our hand we can move it to one of the 3 planets close to us.
Pressing on a card placed on a planet will appear rings:\n-Green ring we can move our card to the neighboring planet\n-Red Ring we can attack an enemy card placed on the neighboring planet
Yellow Ring will appear on the planet where the card will be located and pressing on it will take the resources of that planet
